Functions

int quantizeByPower (Real f, int scale, int possib)
 Quantizes f that belongs to [0,possib/2^scale] into [0,possib-1].
Real dequantizeByPower (int i, int scale, int possib)
 Performs the opposite to quantizeByPower.
